body:
You need to check that there are no groups.

Btw, it would also be nice to tell the user why we couldn't find any algorithm (e.g. `no matching Conv2d algorithm found: tried cuDNN, but tensor shape is invalid; tried THNN, but groups are not supported`).

You could just do simple checks first, and if all of them fail, ask the libraries for reasons why they rejected the input.
